description:
Stable trekking and backpacking boots that support feet on rugged terrain. The 1.8mm suede has a waterproof-breathable membrane and a tough rand for abrasion protection. An EVA midsole and anti-torsion shank cushion and support on rough ground, and the stout rubber sole grips when your trek demands some climbing moves.

  • Durable suede upper has a stretch fabric collar for a comfortable fit
  • GORE-TEX® waterproof-breathable membrane keeps your feet dry in unfavourable weather
  • Polyurethane full rand protects suede from abrasion and adds grip in climbing terrain
  • To-the-toe lacing allows a customized fit
  • Dual-density EVA midsole has an anti-torsion TPU shank for stability
  • Vibram® LiteBase outsole provides traction in loose terrain
  • MegaGrip rubber sticks on friction moves
name: Scarpa Mescalito Trk Gore-Tex Backpacking Boots - Women's
